9b87b6a8-0474-4e3a-8799-fbcbf7b82c69.description: The earner of this badge understands that there is a wide range of fields within manufacturing. This includes designing, development, maintenance, and developing green technology. The earner rcognizes that today’s manufacturing jobs are clean, safe, and innovative. The Seeker badge is part of the Minnesota Manufactured Digital Badge Pathway.
9b87b6a8-0474-4e3a-8799-fbcbf7b82c69.name: Seeker

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a career quiz and list the top six results and corresponding percentages.

f0c91572-754d-4938-a579-ab33c622b8ee.description: Many manufacturing companies are seeking trained welders. Welders study the science of materials and metals (metallurgy) to know how they work together. Some welders work in a manufacturing plant, while others work outside, underwater, or even outer space. This learner has earned the Welder badge by watching a video, featuring someone who works in the field, and answering questions related to this career field.
f0c91572-754d-4938-a579-ab33c622b8ee.name: Welder

badge_template_activities.title: Watch a video about someone who works in the welding field and then answer questions about their experience.

12f3c083-a10e-4039-b680-81eca9644ce4.description: The earner of this badge understands that manufacturing involve the use of high-tech machines and tools, including robotics. The earner has demonstrated interest and skills in robotics attained at a robotics camp. The RoboCamper badge is part of the Minnesota Manufactured Digital Badge Pathway.
12f3c083-a10e-4039-b680-81eca9644ce4.name: RoboCamper

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in a robotics camp.

d8a9c978-c323-4fcc-92de-7f3962f2ad06.description: Many manufacturers are seeking machinists and machine-tool specialists. Employees who work in these careers make parts for a wide variety of products, from computers to medical devices. They use computer software and technology, as well as a variety of tools and processes—lathes, gauges, calipers, swiss machining and 3D printing. This learner has earned the Tooling badge by watching a video, featuring someone who works in the field, and answering questions related to this career field.
d8a9c978-c323-4fcc-92de-7f3962f2ad06.name: Tooling

badge_template_activities.title: Watch a video about someone who works in the machining field and then answer questions about their experience.

da0d0130-3789-4f23-84c2-1b1640884fa7.description: Many manufacturing companies are seeking trained robotics and automation specialists. These jobs require math and engineering skills, as well as knowledge of mechanics, design, production, computers, and electronics. These high-tech jobs have the “cool” factor and pay a good wage. This learned has earned the Automation badge by watching a video, featuring someone who works in the field, and answering questions related to this career field.
da0d0130-3789-4f23-84c2-1b1640884fa7.name: Automation

badge_template_activities.title: Watch a video about someone who works in the automation field and then answer questions about their experience.

94a1da04-cbe5-4870-9860-fd849ce6d137.description: Unlike the manufacturing careers of the past, today’s manufacturing jobs are clean, safe, and innovative. There are many career opportunities, including engineering, production, and much more. These are high-paying, rewarding jobs that are in demand throughout the state. This learner has demonstrated an interest in learning about post-secondary educational requirements and earned the Pathfinder badge by touring a college campus.
94a1da04-cbe5-4870-9860-fd849ce6d137.name: Pathfinder

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in a tour of a college campus and talk to a manufacturing program faculty member.

225cfe74-bbc2-4e56-866a-a31e245c739e.description: Many manufacturers are seeking engineers and technologists. Employees who work in this career field understand technological processes, materials, and techniques, as well as their impact on people, organizations, and culture. They apply scientific knowledge and mathematics to solve technical, societal, and commercial problems. This learner has earned the Engineer badge by watching a video, featuring someone who works in the field, and answering questions related to this career field.
225cfe74-bbc2-4e56-866a-a31e245c739e.name: Engineer

badge_template_activities.title: Watch a video about someone who works in the engineering field and then answer questions about their experience.

bca27945-8d4e-4762-a183-3e827fcd58d1.description: Many manufacturers are seeking mechanical designers. Employees who work in this career field design products using the latest computer hardware, 3D modeling and computer-aided design (CAD) manufacturing software. They need to understand rapid prototyping, 3D printing, and reverse engineering. This learner has earned the Designer badge by watching a video, featuring someone who works in the field, and answering questions related to this career field.
bca27945-8d4e-4762-a183-3e827fcd58d1.name: Designer

badge_template_activities.title: Watch a video about someone who works in the mechanical design field and then answer questions about their experience.

70bfa7d5-2a67-4f89-969f-4af4ace0a7bf.description: Many manufacturers are seeking talented support workers. These employees perform a wide variety of support services, including accounting and finance, marketing and sales, graphic design, human resources, information technology, safety, strategic planning, scheduling, and project management. This learner has earned the Supporter badge by watching a video about manufacturing support careers, featuring someone who works in the field, and answering questions related to this career field.
70bfa7d5-2a67-4f89-969f-4af4ace0a7bf.name: Supporter

badge_template_activities.title: Watch a video about someone who works in the manufacturing support field and then answer questions about their experience.

7693b57b-b78d-4555-89db-6ef9923fb458.description: Today’s manufacturing jobs involve the use of many high-tech machines and tools, including robotics. These jobs also require the ability to function well in a team setting. This learner has demonstrated skill in robotics, as well as an ability to be a team player through participation in a robotics team. The Teamwork badge is part of the Minnesota Manufactured Digital Badge Pathway.
7693b57b-b78d-4555-89db-6ef9923fb458.name: Teamwork

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in a robotics team.

a1a6eab0-f43b-4602-906a-db09ebfaeaed.description: Today’s manufacturing jobs involve the use of many high-tech machines and tools, including robotics. Winning a robotics team competition demonstrates skill and mastery of many STEM concepts while also building on the ability to work as part of a team. These fundamental skills are in high demand in today’s manufacturing careers. This learner has shown a high level of teamwork by winning a local robotics competition. The Winner badge is part of the Minnesota Manufactured Digital Badge Pathway
a1a6eab0-f43b-4602-906a-db09ebfaeaed.name: Winner

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in and win a local robotics competition.

d7e3737f-d192-4521-81f1-6e171d8193d3.description: Unlike the manufacturing careers of the past, today’s manufacturing jobs are clean, safe, and innovative. There are many career opportunities, including engineering, production, and much more. These are high-paying, rewarding jobs that are in demand throughout the state. This learner has demonstrated an interest in learning about today’s advanced manufacturing and earned the Footloose badge by touring a manufacturing facility.
d7e3737f-d192-4521-81f1-6e171d8193d3.name: Footloose

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in a tour of a manufacturing facility.

17740677-de15-4bc1-b49c-6240de4681fc.description: Critical thinking is an important skill for advanced manufacturing employees. Youth who work on this badge learn to understand the importance of critical thinking in the workplace, benefits of critical thought, and how to employ critical thinking strategies. This earner has demonstrated enhanced critical thinking skills by completing Career Success Module 15 and earning the Critical Thinker badge, which is part of the Minnesota Manufactured Digital Badge Pathway.
17740677-de15-4bc1-b49c-6240de4681fc.name: Critical Thinker

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Career Success Module 15: Critical Thinking

4b54017c-cf74-416a-aac1-4431eb29cd42.description: The earner of this badge understands that manufacturing requires the use of high-tech machines and tools, as well as knowledge of science, technology, engineering, and math (STEM). The earner has demonstrated interest in manufacturing and STEM-related knowledge through attending a summer camp. The Handy One badge is part of the Minnesota Manufactured Digital Badge Pathway.
4b54017c-cf74-416a-aac1-4431eb29cd42.name: Handy One

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in a STEM camp.

c590f564-dd25-4bce-9485-f585e089fdfa.description: Problem solving is an important advanced manufacturing skill. Employees who are good problem solvers experience increased job satisfaction, creativity, credibility with management, and chances for promotion. This earner has shown a commitment to learning the importance of problem solving by completing Career Success Module 9: Problem Solver and earning the Problem Solver badge, which is part of the Minnesota Manufactured Digital Badge Pathway.
c590f564-dd25-4bce-9485-f585e089fdfa.name: Problem Solver

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Career Success Module 9: Problem Solver

b2fb2fbb-671f-453f-a797-0d819ee4f7e0.description: Unlike the manufacturing careers of the past, today’s manufacturing jobs are clean, safe, and innovative. There are many career opportunities, including engineering, production, and much more. These are high-paying, rewarding jobs that are in demand throughout Minnesota and the United States. This learner has demonstrated an interest in learning about manufacturing careers and earned the Expositor badge by attending a career expo.
b2fb2fbb-671f-453f-a797-0d819ee4f7e0.name: Expositor

badge_template_activities.title: Attend a career expo event.

3408152c-bab9-4a89-8514-785f90bcf2e6.description: The earner of this badge understands that there are several career opportunities, including welding, production, design, and more. The earner has demonstrated interest in manufacturing skills by participating in a mobile manufacturing lab that includes hands-on experience. The Lab Rat badge is part of the Minnesota Manufactured Digital Badge Pathway.
3408152c-bab9-4a89-8514-785f90bcf2e6.name: Lab Rat

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in a hands-on mobile manufacturing lab experience.

5289cb76-80c5-47ee-8add-47bc0f6ed891.description: Successful employees are responsible and accountable. They are on-time, complete assigned tasks, perform according to set standards, and help meet organizational goals. This leads to improved job performance, better team relationships, and increased self-esteem. This earner has learned the importance of responsibility and accountability by completing Career Success Module 8 and earning the Responsible badge, which is part of the Minnesota Manufactured Digital Badge Pathway.
5289cb76-80c5-47ee-8add-47bc0f6ed891.name: Responsible

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Career Success Module 8: Responsibility and Accountability

8961a50c-e2fc-4f09-8663-e568f5c7ca3a.description: Today’s advanced manufacturing jobs are high-skill and high-tech. They require innovation, teamwork, and problem-solving skills. Visiting a manufacturing facility is a terrific way to learn about modern manufacturing. This learner has attended a Statewide Tour of Manufacturing event and earned the Tourist badge, which is part of the Minnesota Manufactured Digital Badge Pathway.
8961a50c-e2fc-4f09-8663-e568f5c7ca3a.name: Tourist

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in an official Statewide Tour of Manufacturing event.

e339d104-bb11-4137-94fd-ed2a1f297a73.description: Today’s manufacturing jobs are clean, safe, and high-tech. Many manufacturing processes require the use of automation and robotics, some of which require significant teamwork to complete. This learner has demonstrated an interest in robotics and the ability to use social media by shooting a photo that illustrates teamwork at a robotics competition and posting that photo to Twitter. The Tweeter badge is part of the Minnesota Manufactured Digital Badge Pathway.
e339d104-bb11-4137-94fd-ed2a1f297a73.name: Tweeter

badge_template_activities.title: Shoot a photo that illustrates teamwork at a robotics competition and post that photo to Twitter

4dd07ec0-6642-4565-940e-54f14a121478.description: The earner of this badge understands there are different job opportunities in manufacturing including engineering, production, welding, and more. The earner understands that manufacturing jobs are clean, safe, and innovative. Career Exploration camps help the earner understand what types of careers within manufacturing may be the best personal fit. The Explorer badge is part of the Minnesota Manufactured Digital Badge Pathway.
4dd07ec0-6642-4565-940e-54f14a121478.name: Explorer

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in a Career Exploration camp.

b9bd0099-b92f-467f-922a-b25ef98628af.description: The earner of this badge has learned the fundamentals of the manufacturing process and manufacturing terms. Earners of the Announcer badge recognize the importance of effective communication in written and spoken formats. The Announcer badge is part of the Minnesota Manufactured Badge Pathway.
b9bd0099-b92f-467f-922a-b25ef98628af.name: Announcer

badge_template_activities.title: Create a social media post that expresses what impresses him/her about advanced manufacturing.

7d53e5de-6cb9-4ccd-89a9-2737e3bbc898.description: Today’s manufacturing jobs involve the use of many high-tech machines and tools, including robotics. Winning a robotics team competition demonstrates skill and mastery of many STEM concepts while also building ability to work as part of a team. This learner has earned the Herald Badge and demonstrated an interest in robotics, teamwork, and competition by creating a video documenting robotics teamwork. The Herald badge is part of the Minnesota Manufactured Digital Badge Pathway.
7d53e5de-6cb9-4ccd-89a9-2737e3bbc898.name: Herald

badge_template_activities.title: Create a video documenting robotics teamwork.

6e2b8780-b9c7-4bb7-ae20-f065966a3573.description: The earner of this badge has learned fundamentals of the manufacturing process and manufacturing terms, demonstrating interest in, and introductory readiness for, today’s high-tech manufacturing industry. The earner recognizes there is a process for making things that starts with a concept, goes to development, and ends with production. The Novice badge is part of the Minnesota Manufactured Badge Pathway.
6e2b8780-b9c7-4bb7-ae20-f065966a3573.name: Novice

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Activities 1 and 2 in "Introduction to Manufacturing" module

fa8a0749-2989-403f-8620-c2cc4fe91281.description: Unlike the manufacturing careers of the past, today’s manufacturing jobs are clean, safe, and innovative. There are many career opportunities, including engineering, production, and much more. One of the best ways to learn about these careers is to visit with a manufacturer at a job fair. This learner has demonstrated an interest in learning about manufacturing careers and earned the Wayfairer badge by attending a job fair.
fa8a0749-2989-403f-8620-c2cc4fe91281.name: Wayfairer

badge_template_activities.title: Visit a manufacturer's booth or presentation at a job fair.

7e3536fe-4308-4ac6-92f9-e56e8fbe8dc6.description: Today’s manufacturing jobs involve the use of many high-tech machines and tools, including robotics. Winning a robotics team competition shows skill and mastery of many STEM concepts while also building on the ability to work as part of a team. These fundamental skills are in high demand in today’s manufacturing careers. This learner has demonstrated a high level of teamwork by winning a state robotics competition. The Champion badge is part of the Minnesota Manufactured Digital Badge Pathway
7e3536fe-4308-4ac6-92f9-e56e8fbe8dc6.name: Champion

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in and win a state robotics competition.

3993c612-8940-4757-b385-11ab71819012.description: The earner of this badge understands that manufacturers must be innovative in the approach to problem solving and meeting the customer needs. Manufacturers create items from different materials and parts by using various machines, tools, and processes. The earner recognized the manufacturing process from beginning to end, including design, development, creation, testing, and modification of a prototype. The Creator badge is part of the Minnesota Manufactured Digital Badge Pathway.
3993c612-8940-4757-b385-11ab71819012.name: Creator

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a vehicle prototype.
Answer questions found on page 12 of “Introduction to Manufacturing.

ce37579a-6623-481e-8ab5-66e59cd5baf6.description: Today’s advanced manufacturing jobs involve the use of many high-tech machines, tools, and processes. These are high-paying and rewarding careers that are meeting the needs of customers and society. This learner has created a video that illustrates what they think is so cool about manufacturing and earned the Videographer badge, which is part of the Minnesota Manufactured Digital Badge Pathway.
ce37579a-6623-481e-8ab5-66e59cd5baf6.name: Videographer

badge_template_activities.title: Create a video showing what they think is cool and interesting about manufacturing.

230819bb-c867-4dcd-9ca8-f8e584a527be.description: The earner of this badge understands that manufacturing involves the use of high-tech tools and encompasses a wide range of fields, including designing machinery, developing products, knowing how to fix robots, working in software, and developing green technology. The Career Wise badge is part of the Minnesota Manufactured Digital Badge Pathway.
230819bb-c867-4dcd-9ca8-f8e584a527be.name: Career Wise

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Activity 3 in “Introduction to Manufacturing" module

Create a presentation including an image (photo) of a manufacturing machine (or tool), explanation of an industry where the machine is used, description of a product made by this machine in Minnesota, where the product is made in Minnesota and which portion of the manufacturing cycle this machine is used for (could be more than one focus)

dc57e961-de8c-42df-806c-79eae35e8b66.description: The earner of this badge understands there are different job opportunities in manufacturing including engineering, production, welding, and more. The earner understands that manufacturing jobs are clean, safe, and innovative. Career Exploration camps help the earner understand what types of careers within manufacturing may be the best personal fit. The Explorer badge is part of the Minnesota Manufactured Digital Badge Pathway.
dc57e961-de8c-42df-806c-79eae35e8b66.name: Explorer

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in a Career Exploration camp.

1b8101ea-791a-4634-b5f7-0d26c0de9674.description: The earner of this badge understands the nature and the importance of manufacturing in the state and the national economy, as well as the locations of several important Minnesota manufacturers. The Map Maker badge is part of the Minnesota Manufactured Digital Badge Pathway.
1b8101ea-791a-4634-b5f7-0d26c0de9674.name: Map Maker

badge_template_activities.title: Watch two manufacturing videos: Douglas Scientific and BTD profile
Complete Activity 5 in “Introduction to Manufacturing” module
Complete Activity 6 in "Introduction to Manufacturing" module, successfully marking a map showing the location of ten important Minnesota manufacturers

3b861068-795c-4d38-9b5d-8c79123f8093.description: Today’s advanced manufacturing jobs are high-skill and high-tech. They require innovation, teamwork, and problem-solving skills, and working for a manufacturer as an intern, apprentice, or as a summer job is a terrific way to learn more about a career in advanced manufacturing. This learner has shown initiative by securing and completing a work experience at a local manufacturer and earning the Resident badge, which is part of the Minnesota Manufactured Digital Badge Pathway.
3b861068-795c-4d38-9b5d-8c79123f8093.name: Resident

badge_template_activities.title: Complete an internship, apprenticeship, or part-time job experience with a local manufacturer.

4cbc935f-d749-4d43-9850-c58c41a6aeb1.description: Today’s advanced manufacturing jobs are high-skill and high-tech. They require innovation, teamwork, and problem-solving skills. Job shadowing is a terrific way to learn what a real work day looks like in a manufacturing facility. This learner has participated in a job shadowing experience at a local manufacturer and earned the Shadower badge, which is part of the Minnesota Manufactured Digital Badge Pathway.
4cbc935f-d749-4d43-9850-c58c41a6aeb1.name: Shadower

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a job shadowing experience at a  local manufacturer.
